channel.title: Customized Yell
channel.description:
Hi, First post here I hope someone can help, I have been playing a server called grinderscape for awhile now and really like a feature they have called Customize Yell, It lets you change what your yell tag says and what color it is in game, Here is a screen shot to show what I mean.
http://imgur.com/pBFbx
I was hoping someone could help me in adding something similar to this into my PI server, The source is TrisidiaX V3, Thank you for your time And hopefully somone can Help I would really appreciate it.
